name: 郭忠義
objective: 本科目介紹作業系統之基本觀念、設計、實作方法。主要內容包括：1. 作業系統之演進 2. 程序與執行序 3.平行程序之特性4.同步機制5. 虛擬記憶體 6. 分散式系統 7.分散式同作控制 8. 檔案架構與管理9.磁碟管理與資料存取10. 排程模式 11. 系統及網路安全
schedule:
Week 1  (2/18, 2/20) OS Structure
Week 2  (2/25, 2/27) Process
Week 3  (3/04, 3/06) Process 
Week 4  (3/11, 3/13) Thread, Quiz#1
Week 5  (3/18, 3/20) Process Synchronization
Week 6  (3/25, 3/27) Process Synchronization
Week 7  (4/01, 4/03) CPU Scheduling
Week 8  (4/08, 4/10) CPU Scheduling, Quiz#2
Week 9  (4/15, 4/17) Deadlocks ,Midterm
Week 10 (4/22, 4/24) Main Memory
Week 11 (4/29, 5/01) Virtual Memory
Week 12 (5/06, 5/08) Virtual Memory
Week 13 (5/13, 5/15) Chap 11, Quiz#3
Week 14 (5/20, 5/22) Mass-Storage Structure
Week 15 (5/27, 5/29) File-System Interface
Week 16 (6/03, 6/05) File-System  Implementation
Week 17 (6/10, 6/12) I/O System, Quiz#4
Week 18 (6/17) Final
